channel.title: Scar slow?
channel.description:
Ok,
I used to script awhile ago, then i kinda left runescape for about a mouth.
Now i come back, when i try to use my scripts, my computer lags like a bitch.
But when i run the script, if the scripts running, and i minimize Mozilla, the lagging(Computer Slow) stops.
When i maximize it again, the laging begins.
I have tryed formatting my computer,
I tryed running the script on windows xp and windows 2000.
Yes i did all the basic shit, Choose the colors and chose the rs windows.
Every script i use does not do anything.
on stupid3ooo power miner, it justs turns my private chat, etc off and then my computer starts going real slow.
Really slow, like my mouse is jumping around the screen.
anyone got answers, because i really want to start learning scar, but i can't if i can't test my scripts.
Thanks. ;D

item.title: Scar slow?
item.dc:creator: @Bllizzd Bllizzd
item.description:
@Bllizzd wrote:

Yah, but what about starblasters powerminer,

ill try some other scripts.

Read full topic

item.title: Scar slow?
item.dc:creator: @Home Home
item.description:
@Home wrote:

Hey reason might be because Autominers(Stupido’s) is very outdated and uses SSI2 What doesn’t have up-dated fucntions what can cause major lagg… like when searching some bitmap what doesn’t evn exist anymore.

Read full topic
